9.20.18  11:46 am   Spotify is soon going to let indie artists upload songs directly without needing a label or third party site. WIll this make the process easier for you?

      (so we maybe can get more of your songs on the platform)
9.20.18  11:45 am   what does language mean to you
9.20.18  11:44 am   now, let's say, for example, that i were to pose a question. what would your response be?
9.20.18  10:56 am   Any plans to tour live with a band?
9.20.18  9:32 am   If organic life (humans) can create digital mind that's superior to humans, can digital mind create organic life that's superior to it?

9.20.18  9:01 am   hey so you were wondering if the gift shop of mt. st. helens is still "there" but I'm curious if you thought the chord on "there" was too regular as just a little 2 5,

      since the picture being painted is kind of distant and longing, where as the chord is very straightforward feeling. Though at the same time i understand your choice within the context of the piece and the time limit. curious if you have any tidbits
9.20.18  8:33 am   How does your perception of dogs differ from other peoples perception of dogs?
9.20.18  8:33 am   Do you feel like a better person when people say that your music/videos helped them with their depression/other mental illness?

9.20.18  8:12 am   As far as I can recall, none of your songs have had a fading outro vamp before "Mount St. Helens is about to Blow Up".

      Was this just a particular stylistic choice for this song,

      or was it done in the interest of saving time due to your extremely tight production schedule?
9.20.18  4:12 am   Interesting choice to incorporate screenshots of the software on your computer in your videos. What made you choose that?
9.20.18  3:41 am   Are you annoyed with the incorrect use to the word "literally."

9.20.18  3:37 am   Hey Bill, I just missed the opportunity to go to a music school in New York and instead went to a local college as a non-music major. Do you have any advice for me?

      I feel like I will regret my decision for the rest of my life because I wasn't brave enough to take the challenge/risk of going to school there.

      I love your work!
9.20.18  3:10 am   Why do you want to write songs so bad? Why not just get an easy job and chill? Asking for a friend.
9.20.18  3:03 am   How do you write such nice songs?
9.20.18  2:34 am   How to overcome boredom when you don't have motivation to do the things that once made passionate?

9.20.18  2:15 am   I love everything you do and you really inspire me. How you compile everything you do and answer every question is crazy and is really how I wanna be. One day I want to look through this website and look at everything on here. How do you manage to have any free time? You answer questions so often,

      I can't understand how you have time to work on your fantastic songs.

9.20.18  2:01 am   hey! have you done any experimenting with the text/graphics settings in the editing software you use? if it's premiere, i think it's super powerful and is very good at not including extraneous textbox edges from screenshots. and it's super easy to keyframe them around just like you do already. except this time the text is in the program instead of in your notes program. may be a simple game change of copy/paste instead of screenshot/import. i hope this was helpful or enlightening in some way

9.20.18  1:58 am   Many people I have talked to say they don't like your songs because they're 'heavily rely on random humor' which I don't think is true because I don't particularly find your songs funny. When I listen to your songs I feel like I'm going on an adventure alongside a cool neat character who's just living life and seeing what they can see. When you make songs and videos together, what to you are the visuals and music trying to make the listener feel? (If anything at all)

9.20.18  1:53 am   When do you sleep? I noticed reading your answers that you have something posted at least every hour.

      Or do you queue your answers to keep the needy at bay?

9.20.18  1:48 am   if i am correct, all the songs are sung from the viewer's perspective, or "my" perspective. is that true?

      also, by the way, are you still in portland?

     i recently went to this small venue there called hawthorne theater next to a Mexican place called pepinos and i just wanted to warn you about pepinos

9.20.18  1:22 am   Hey, I know this isn't a question but I'm sorry for any backlash you are getting for that comment about ADHD and that asshole who's stalking you. I was prescribed adderall and a cocktail of other drugs to "combat" my "ADHD" which I turned out not to have. The shit they gave me made me someone else. On top of the doctor doubling and tripling the doses of the drugs made me lose 75% of my friends in Elementary school, which I didn't even really recover from until High school. Irritable, unwilling to stop tasks, violent, the stuff they "medically" prescribed me made me lose all trust in "doctors". Sorry about the use of " " marks and clogging up your question page but that guy talking shit about you really activated my almonds and I felt like I needed to defend my favorite artist.
9.20.18  1:14 am   Will you run for Internet Congress?
